en.t1: TuGraph uses an attribute graph model. The graph model is the modeling of things and their relationships, and consists of vertices/nodes, edges/relationships and their properties. Let's take the picture of yago as an example.
en.t2: As shown in the figure above, the yago data contains a total of 5 types of vertices and 8 types of edges, which together describe the basic relationship between the movie and the actors, and the user's rating of the movie.
en.t3: movie vertex. Indicates a specific movie, such as "Forrest Gump"。
en.t4: person vertex. Represents an individual, for the film may be an actor, director, or screenwriter.
en.t5: genre vertex. Indicates the type of movie, such as drama, horror.
en.t6: keyword vertex. Indicates some keywords related to the movie, such as "save the world", "virtual reality", and "subway".
en.t7: user vertex. Indicates the user watching the movie.
en.t8: The produce edge connects person and movie. Indicates the relationship of the producer of the film.
en.t9: The acted_in edge connects person and movie. Indicates which movies the actor starred in.
en.t10: The direct edge connects person and movie. Indicates who the director of the film is.
en.t11: The write edge connects person and movie. Indicates the screenwriter relationship of the film.
en.t12: The has_genre edge connects movie and genre. Indicates the type classification of the movie.
en.t13: The has_keyword edge connects movie and keyword. Some keywords that represent the video, that is, more detailed tags.
en.t14: The rate edge connects user and movie. Indicates the user's rating of the movie.
en.t15: The is_friend edge connects user and user. Indicates the friend relationship between the user and the user.

zh.t1: TuGraph采用属性图模型。图模型是对事物及其关联关系的建模，由顶点（vertices/nodes）、边（edges/relationships）及其属性（property）组成。我们以yago的图为例进行介绍。
zh.t2: 如上图所示，yago数据共包含5种顶点，8种边，共同描述电影和演员的基本关系，以及用户对电影的评分。
zh.t3: movie 顶点。表示某一部具体的影片，比如"阿甘正传"。
zh.t4: person 顶点。表示个人，对影片来说可能是演员、导演，或编剧。
zh.t5: genre 顶点。表示影片的类型，比如剧情片、恐怖片。
zh.t6: keyword 顶点。表示与影片相关的一些关键字，比如“拯救世界”、“虚拟现实”、“地铁”。
zh.t7: user 顶点。表示观影的用户。
zh.t8: produce 边，连接person和movie。表示影片的出品人关系。
zh.t9: acted_in 边，连接person和movie。表示演员出演了哪些影片。
zh.t10: direct 边，连接person和movie。表示影片的导演是谁。
zh.t11: write 边，连接person和movie。表示影片的编剧关系。
zh.t12: has_genre 边，连接movie和genre。表示影片的类型分类。
zh.t13: has_keyword 边，连接movie和keyword。表示影片的一些关键字，即更细分类的标签。
zh.t14: rate 边，连接user和movie。表示用户对影片的打分。
zh.t15: is_friend 边，连接user和user。表示用户和用户的好友关系。
